div.div: Increase of European wild boar populations and mean winter temperatures.
div.p: (a) Color-coded wild boar densities in various regions 1985 and 2005, respectively. For six exemplary regions time courses of wild boar hunting bags (b) as well as corresponding changes in long-term mean winter temperatures (30-year means, 1973â€“2002) (c) are shown: 1 = North-Rhine Westphalia (DE), 2 = Bavaria (DE), 3 = Alsace (FR), 4 = Lower Austria (AT), 5 = Espace Mittelland (CH), 6 = Carinthia (AT).
